title: 109_s1163
content: Sectoral Market Assessment for Regional Training Enhancement and Revitalization Act - Amends the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to direct the Secretary of Labor to make skills gap capacity grants to states to assist local boards and regional consortia, through certain partnerships, to make: (1) strategic sectoral skills gap assessments, (2) strategic skills gap action plans. And (3) strategic training capacity enhancement seed grants to providers of training services.
